product_name: Outdoor Research Deluxe Spring Ring Headnet
long_description: Enjoy this chemical-free way to keep bugs off your face. The Deluxe version is cut a bit wide to accommodate wide-brimmed sun hats. Made of gray no-see-um mesh, headnet keeps those pesky mosquitoes and other insects off you. Thin stainless-steel spring ring keeps mesh wrinkle-free and away from your face so you can see out clearly. Drawstring with toggle cinches at the collar to keep mosquitoes out. Collapses into a tidy package with a simple twist of the metal ring and cinch of the drawcord. One size fits most.
short_description: Enjoy this chemical-free way to keep bugs off your face. The Deluxe version is cut a bit wide to accommodate wide-brimmed sun hats.
